name: Super Mayhem Boxes
description:
This game was an attempt at recreating an old Garry's Mod gamemode that was under-popular: Noxious.net's "Super Mario Boxes", later renamed to "Super Mayhem Boxes".

Being a 2D physics based platformer shooter, this project eventually lost steam due to bad networking problems and unsolvable input delay. This was my first ever networked project, and uses Unity's (the now) legacy networking system.

You can still play this game. Just open up multiple instances. One instance must be a "server" and can't be played on.

If this project is ever revived it would likely be completely from scratch.
